properties.name: Brown University
properties.description: Posted by CarmensandiagoOne of the less talked about ivies, Brown is my favorite because the students are happy and get a large role in choosing their classes and structuring their majors. They get to foster their own creativity and grow academically.

properties.name: Ecole Hotelaire de Laussane
properties.description: Posted by CarmensandiagoLaussane, SwitzerlandEHL is the strongest hotel management university in the world and is set in one the world\'s best countries to live in Switzerland. The people are nice, the food is good, and the living conditions are unparalleled.

properties.name: Exeter College, Turl Street, Oxford
properties.description: Posted by CarmensandiagoOxfordshire, England, UKThis is one of the many filming locations for the Golden Compass. It is also the alma mater of the author, Phillip Pullman.

properties.name: Grindelwald, Kanton
properties.description: Posted by CarmensandiagoBern, SwitzerlandThis is one of the many film locations for the Golden Compass.

properties.name: Jordan College
properties.description: Posted by CarmensandiagoIt\'s the home of Lyra Belacqua, of the Golden Compass (Northern Lights). It\'s a fictional college modeled after Exeter College, a part of the University of Oxford.

properties.name: Jordan College
properties.description: Posted by CarmensandiagoLyra\'s hometown, where the film and novel both begin. It\'s in a fictional Jordan College that is modeled after Exeter College of Oxford, Pullman\'s alma mater. This is where Lyra gets the Alethiometer, and where she first learns of Dust.

properties.name: MIT
properties.description: Posted by Carmensandiago77 Mass Ave. Cambridge MAMIT is the best technical/engineering university in the world and is located in Cambridge, one the US\'s oldest cities. It is two subway stops from Harvard (via the red line) and enjoys a friendly rivalry with them.

properties.name: Magesterium Research Station
properties.description: Posted by CarmensandiagoSomewhere in the north, the Gobblers have a research station where they experimenting on the kidnapped children. This is wwhere Lyra and the Gyptians (and some witches) are headed.

properties.name: Mrs. Coulter's Flat
properties.description: Posted by CarmensandiagoLondon, EnglandLyra desperately wants to go North to find out the truth about Dust, and Mrs. Coulter promises to take Lyra there, so Lyra leaves Jordan college to be her personal assistant.

properties.name: Mrs. Coulter's Flat
properties.description: Posted by CarmensandiagoLondon, EnglandMrs. Coulter invites Lyra to come be her assistant and promises to take her to the North. Lyra leaves Jordan college to live with Mrs. Coulter in her London flat.

properties.name: Port
properties.description: Posted by CarmensandiagoThe Gyptians rescue Lyra and take her with them on their voyage north to rescue the kids that have been kidnapped from the Gobblers. At the port, she befriends Lee Scoresby, an astronaut who convinces her to hire Iorek Byrnison, an exiled Panserbjørn (armored bear) to fight for them.
